mapper.sql: a.insurance_policy_id AS "insurancePolicyId", a.policy_holder AS "policyHolder", a.policy_phone AS "policyPhone", a.site_postcode AS "sitePostcode", a.email_address AS "emailAddress", a.the_insured AS "theInsured", a.the_insured_phone AS "theInsuredPhone", a.the_insured_site AS "theInsuredSite", a.postal_code AS "postalCode", a.insure_area AS "insureArea", a.category AS "category", a.creation_time AS "creationTime", a.practice_number AS "practiceNumber", a.grade AS "grade", a.mold AS "mold", a.nature AS "nature", a.department AS "department", a.sickbed_number AS "sickbedNumber", a.people_number AS "peopleNumber", a.medical_staff_number AS "medicalStaffNumber", a.everyone_quota AS "everyoneQuota", a.spirit_quota AS "spiritQuota", a.everytime_quota AS "everytimeQuota", a.accumulated_quota AS "accumulatedQuota", a.law_everytime_quota AS "lawEverytimeQuota", a.law_accumulated_quota AS "lawAccumulatedQuota", a.append_everytime_quota AS "appendEverytimeQuota", a.append_accumulated_quota AS "appendAccumulatedQuota", a.bed_premium AS "bedPremium", a.medical_premium AS "medicalPremium", a.all_way AS "allWay", a.sel_way AS "selWay", a.all_medical_number AS "allMedicalNumber", a.all_everyone_premium AS "allEveryonePremium", a.all_premium_total AS "allPremiumTotal", a.sel_everyone_premium AS "selEveryonePremium", a.sel_clinic_operation_number AS "selClinicOperationNumber", a.sel_clinic_notoperation_number AS "selClinicNotoperationNumber", a.sel_medical_laboratory_number AS "selMedicalLaboratoryNumber", a.sel_premium_total AS "selPremiumTotal", a.basic_premium_total AS "basicPremiumTotal", a.add_reduce AS "addReduce", a.enchance_deduction AS "enchanceDeduction", a.risk_float AS "riskFloat", a.asleft_premium AS "asleftPremium", a.addittion_risk AS "addittionRisk", a.addittion_premium AS "addittionPremium", a.computational_formula AS "computationalFormula", a.oddicial_receipts_permium AS "oddicialReceiptsPermium", a.insurance_date AS "insuranceDate", a.insurance_start_time AS "insuranceStartTime", a.insurance_end_time AS "insuranceEndTime", a.retroactive_date AS "retroactiveDate", a.retroactive_strat_date AS "retroactiveStratDate", a.retroactive_end_date AS "retroactiveEndDate", a.premium_delicery_time AS "premiumDeliceryTime", a.dispute AS "dispute", a.arbitrator AS "arbitrator", a.insure_conditions AS "insureConditions", a.accident_conditions AS "accidentConditions", a.special_agreement AS "specialAgreement", a.signature AS "signature", a.insure_date AS "insureDate", a.assume_nature AS "assumeNature", a.agency_code AS "agencyCode", a.agency_name AS "agencyName", a.state AS "state", a.reject AS "reject", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o2 ON o2.id = a.policy_holder
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM INSURANCE_SLIP a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.policy_holder LIKE '%'||#{policyHolder}||'%' '%'+#{policyHolder}+'%' concat('%',#{policyHolder},'%')
AND a.policy_phone LIKE '%'||#{policyPhone}||'%' '%'+#{policyPhone}+'%' concat('%',#{policyPhone},'%')
AND a.site_postcode LIKE '%'||#{sitePostcode}||'%' '%'+#{sitePostcode}+'%' concat('%',#{sitePostcode},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSURANCE_SLIP( insurance_policy_id, policy_holder, policy_phone, site_postcode, email_address, the_insured, the_insured_phone, the_insured_site, postal_code, insure_area, category, creation_time, practice_number, grade, mold, nature, department, sickbed_number, people_number, medical_staff_number, everyone_quota, spirit_quota, everytime_quota, accumulated_quota, law_everytime_quota, law_accumulated_quota, append_everytime_quota, append_accumulated_quota, bed_premium, medical_premium, all_way, sel_way, all_medical_number, all_everyone_premium, all_premium_total, sel_everyone_premium, sel_clinic_operation_number, sel_clinic_notoperation_number, sel_medical_laboratory_number, sel_premium_total, basic_premium_total, add_reduce, enchance_deduction, risk_float, asleft_premium, addittion_risk, addittion_premium, computational_formula, oddicial_receipts_permium, insurance_date, insurance_start_time, insurance_end_time, retroactive_date, retroactive_strat_date, retroactive_end_date, premium_delicery_time, dispute, arbitrator, insure_conditions, accident_conditions, special_agreement, signature, insure_date, assume_nature, agency_code, agency_name, state, reject, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{insurancePolicyId}, #{policyHolder}, #{policyPhone}, #{sitePostcode}, #{emailAddress}, #{theInsured}, #{theInsuredPhone}, #{theInsuredSite}, #{postalCode}, #{insureArea}, #{category}, #{creationTime}, #{practiceNumber}, #{grade}, #{mold}, #{nature}, #{department}, #{sickbedNumber}, #{peopleNumber}, #{medicalStaffNumber}, #{everyoneQuota}, #{spiritQuota}, #{everytimeQuota}, #{accumulatedQuota}, #{lawEverytimeQuota}, #{lawAccumulatedQuota}, #{appendEverytimeQuota}, #{appendAccumulatedQuota}, #{bedPremium}, #{medicalPremium}, #{allWay}, #{selWay}, #{allMedicalNumber}, #{allEveryonePremium}, #{allPremiumTotal}, #{selEveryonePremium}, #{selClinicOperationNumber}, #{selClinicNotoperationNumber}, #{selMedicalLaboratoryNumber}, #{selPremiumTotal}, #{basicPremiumTotal}, #{addReduce}, #{enchanceDeduction}, #{riskFloat}, #{asleftPremium}, #{addittionRisk}, #{addittionPremium}, #{computationalFormula}, #{oddicialReceiptsPermium}, #{insuranceDate}, #{insuranceStartTime}, #{insuranceEndTime}, #{retroactiveDate}, #{retroactiveStratDate}, #{retroactiveEndDate}, #{premiumDeliceryTime}, #{dispute}, #{arbitrator}, #{insureConditions}, #{accidentConditions}, #{specialAgreement}, #{signature}, #{insureDate}, #{assumeNature}, #{agencyCode}, #{agencyName}, #{state}, #{reject}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE INSURANCE_SLIP SET insurance_policy_id = #{insurancePolicyId}, policy_holder = #{policyHolder}, policy_phone = #{policyPhone}, site_postcode = #{sitePostcode}, email_address = #{selClinicNotoperationNumber}, sel_medical_laboratory_number = #{selMedicalLaboratoryNumber}, sel_premium_total = #{selPremiumTotal}, basic_premium_total = #{basicPremiumTotal}, add_reduce = #{addReduce}, enchance_deduction = #{enchanceDeduction}, risk_float = #{riskFloat}, asleft_premium = #{asleftPremium}, addittion_risk = #{addittionRisk}, addittion_premium = #{addittionPremium}, computational_formula = #{computationalFormula}, oddicial_receipts_permium = #{oddicialReceiptsPermium}, insurance_date = #{insuranceDate}, insurance_start_time = #{insuranceStartTime}, insurance_end_time = #{insuranceEndTime}, retroactive_date = #{retroactiveDate}, retroactive_strat_date = #{retroactiveStratDate}, retroactive_end_date = #{retroactiveEndDate}, premium_delicery_time = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE insurance_policy_id = #{insurancePolicyId}
